body:
You might agree or disagree with me on this but I believe the tournament silver or gold or bronze medalist rank does not need to be required especially with the last tournament not going extremely well. 

Also the grey colour does not look good on forums especially for non-donors like me I'd rather just have no tournament rank at all and would prefer just my name on the forums. And it is an extremely long rank which looks disgusting...

P.S: I know people asked for this a long time ago when tournament ended but I want to get it out there to the devs or whoever manages the forums.

No hate pls I want to know what the public thinks about this rank on the forums :) thanks

replies.body:
Bragging rights means nothing because:

  1. We sound salty if we brag
  2. Some people don't consider it a proper tournament due to the flaws
  3. We're just seen as the team that won because of a cheap DQ
